author: sky.cactus
content: The first two are going away with The Merge, so probably not worth categorizing them.  The third is read-only.

author: dock_boss
content: I have not been super up to date with merge info. Is there a doc that details the endpoints being removed/added?

content: I don't think there is anything explicitly saying those will be removed, but those two specifically will do nothing after The Merge.
